mapper.insert: insert into SANITATION_LIST (FRCS_NO, SNT_SEAT_SCR, SNT_FCLT_SCR, SNT_FOOD_SCR, SNT_EMP_SCR, SNT_CHCK_DT) values (#{frcsNo},#{sntSeatScr},#{sntFcltScr},#{sntFoodScr},#{sntEmpScr},#{sntChckDt})
mapper.select: select FRCS_NO, SNT_SEAT_SCR, SNT_FCLT_SCR, SNT_FOOD_SCR, SNT_EMP_SCR, SNT_CHCK_DT from SANITATION_LIST where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SNT_CHCK_DT) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM #{sntChckDt}) and EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SNT_CHCK_DT) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM #{sntChckDt}) and FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo}
select FRCS_NM from FRANCHISE where FRCS_NO=#{crrFrcsNo}

SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SNT_CHCK_DT DESC) RNUM, FRCS_NO, SNT_SEAT_SCR, SNT_FCLT_SCR, SNT_FOOD_SCR, SNT_EMP_SCR, SNT_CHCK_DT, (SNT_SEAT_SCR + SNT_FCLT_SCR + SNT_FOOD_SCR + SNT_EMP_SCR) / 4 AS AVRSCR FROM SANITATION_LIST where FRCS_NO = #{crrFrcsNo}) T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 10)
